title: 3 and Out - Weekend Mailbag on Lance Development, McVay vs. Shanahan, Draft
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Weekend Mailbag on Lance Development, McVay vs. Shanahan, Draft
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including if reports of Trey Lance underwhelming the Niners staff are concerning, if teams should red flag CJ Stroud because Ohio State’s track record of producing underwhelming NFL QB’s, if he would take McVay or Shanahan, and his take on the Seahawks first post-Russ Draft. #herd

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
